Key Match Events: Stephon Castle shadowed De'Aaron Fox to open the game, limiting him to nine points on 4-for-8 shooting in the first half.
Stephon Castle scored seven points in the first quarter, going 3-for-5 from the field, including 1-for-2 from deep.
San Antonio Spurs led 60-55 at halftime, with Castle contributing two rebounds and three assists.
San Antonio's defense, led by Victor Wembanyama and Stephon Castle, limited the Sacramento Kings to 16 points in the third quarter, extending their lead to 84-71.
Castle helped slow down De'Aaron Fox to three third-quarter points.
San Antonio Spurs held a 105-89 advantage with 4:26 to go when Castle left the floor for a brief rest.
